title: Magicraft Directly Download
description:
The legend ! The one who pulls out the staff will be the brave one who saves the world Magicraft is a magic action roguelike game. The game takes the world invaded by ancient gods as the core, creating an aerial magical fantasy world. Astral Ascent
The player will be a brave man who strays into this world and pulls out the legendary staff, Crusades against monsters, combines unique spells, defeats the ancient gods, and saves the world invaded by the ancient gods

system_requirements.Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 Ti (1024 VRAM); Radeon HD 7750 (1024 VRAM)
